8d5436b33b77bdf16e50b3a15d9033d03062c088f9f28d4f37429b468","dweb:/ipfs/QmQd1CFQx3KGMuXN5amAv1fX4Swbp3RZtU3mTrRy9h6nfp"]},"src/MockFlashLoanProvider.sol":{"keccak256":"0xbb11cbe10fa292f8d349cdc47c37ed72dccd2993d38abb9f0a37920a2adc690f","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://a0b1dc3458a9cb7d9aa2b7bd8f7c4fc2f2e07c8c1c1f780aa0349b7cf4bb3760","dweb:/ipfs/QmRq4me9uxsCFpSc5ox7zLRDuBNqi9pwWGe7ZMSDEc5nFZ"]}},"version":1}

calculateFee(uint256).details: Get the current fee for a given amount

params.amount: The amount to calculate fee for

params.data: Additional data to pass to the receiver
params.receiver: The address that will receive the tokens and handle the callback
params.token: The address of the token to borrow

getAvailableLiquidity(address).details: Get available liquidity for a token

hasUserSuccessfullyBorrowed(address).details: Check if user has successfully completed a flash loan

returns._0: Whether the user has successfully borrowed

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

removeLiquidity(address,uint256).details: Remove liquidity from the provider (owner only)

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setTokenWhitelist(address,bool).details: Whitelist or blacklist a token (owner only)

params.whitelisted: Whether the token should be whitelisted

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
